Why don't you sit down first? It feels unpleasant to talk to someone just looming awkwardly over me.
She shifts and curls up her legs, squishing her expansive bosom with her knees and freeing up some space on the couch for you to sit down.
Felicia gets up and casually folds her umbrella and the couch, before nonchalantly putting them over her shoulder.
While the items are not particularly heavy, the display is still impressive as her plush build didn't really hint at a great, hidden strength. You find yourself taking a step back, a bit awestruck.
Sorry to cut our conversation short, but I really need to meet with someone in a couple of hours.
She playfully pokes you in the chest with her fluffy finger and smiles softly.
Hope to see you again, boy.

With that she walks away from the shore, a playful spring in her step, fluffy tail swishing from side to side. You blink and can only wonder how she is walking so effortlessly through all the sharp rocks, with a weight over her shoulder no less.
Accomplishing what you set out to do, you begin walking back to the resort area, quietly hoping you never have to traverse these rocky sands ever again.
Thinking of it, this went smoother than expected. Felicia was reasonably polite, if overly salacious, and never tried to attack you. Perhaps Tina's impression of her is wrong?
Thinking of it, this went smoother than expected. Felicia did flirt rather aggressively, and you ended up fucking, but she was rather friendly about it. Perhaps Tina's impression of her is wrong?

Thinking back on what happened, you wonder what would happen if Felicia kept going... You may need to be wary of her in the future, or your trips to the resort may end abruptly. Perhaps Tina's impression of her is not all wrong...
With these thoughts on your mind, the trip back feels fairly short, and soon you spot Tina fidgeting awkwardly on the edge of resort, waiting for you.
Her face lights up as she sees you, and she jumps happily in place before waving energetically at you.
You're back! You're back, and not tomorrow and not from a different direction, so she didn't fuck you silly!
Hurry, tell me, how did it go?
You explain that Felicia will start visiting the resort at a later date, and that she refused to explain her behavior.
Ah well, I'll get a headache if I worry too much about it, or if ask her about it, so it is probably better I just forget about the matter!
Okay, here is your reward, a thousand eros as promised!

You accept the money and wonder if she's going to say anything else, but she just looks back at you quietly, looking slightly confused by your silence. Did she forget about the other part of the reward she mentioned in the quest posting?
Of course, I did promise after all!
Tina takes a step closer before gently wrapping her arms around you, wiggling her hips happily. You hug her back, wrapping your arms around her waist and bringing her closer.

Tilting your head up to kiss the taller succubus, you feel her lips touch yours softly. She tastes {i}really{/i} good, and you wonder if she merely pretended to forget about the kiss reward and was actually well-prepared.

Her longer tongue slips into your mouth, gently probing at first, but soon intertwining passionately with your own. She moans quietly and presses herself closer to you, kissing you deeper and more desperately.

She whines softly as you hug her closer and momentarily breaks the kiss, gasping for air. Her arms fidget around your back, as if wanting to squeeze you as tight as possible, but not daring to. Blushing harder she dives into the kiss again, almost bumping your foreheads in her cute eagerness.
Despite your dancing tongues and Tina's inherently erotic nature, this kiss doesn't feel very sexual. More like something coming from a gentle and awkwardly sincere gratitude and affection.
Coming from a succubus, you wonder if this may be something special.
Suddenly breaking the embrace Tina steps back, giving you a shy smile. 'Thank you', she whispers, before blushing even more fiercely and bolting away.
You feel a little stunned for a moment, and after gathering your thoughts decide to return back to town for the day, a job well-done and well-paid.
You decide not to press the issue and bid farewell to Tina with a nod.
She waves you off with a smile, but you feel like she may looked a little disappointed. Did she want to kiss you but was too shy to offer?
With a shrug you return back to town for the day, a job well-done.
